detectors.description:
MDXT.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MDXT.sol#80-85) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(_msgSender(),1000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MDXT.sol#84)
detectors.markdown:
[MDXT.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MDXT.sol#L80-L85) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_mint(_msgSender(),1000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals())))](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MDXT.sol#L84)

detectors.description:

symbol() should be declared external:

totalSupply() should be declared external:

	- MDXT.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MDXT.sol#105-107)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
